author: Magyar Nemzet
title: Ground News - Joshua with the brutal KO also sent messages to Ukraine and the Gypsy King on the night + video
text: Anthony Joshua defeated former UFC heavyweight champion Francis Ngannou with a brutal KO on Friday night in Riyadh. The former British world champion has been described several times, but after his convincing success, he sent a message to the Gypsy King: Joshua says that instead of Tyson Fury, he would now be awarded the World Cup belt. Moreover, there are already opinions that the champion of the Ukrainians, Oleksandr Usyk, also has reason to f… 41 minutes ago·Budapest, HungaryRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
